text: Cuireann sóchán éagsúlacht ghéiniteach nua leis, agus trí roghnú baintear é as linn na n-athruithe léirithe.

clean_output: The first time I saw a submarine was when I was a boy and I was on the beach and I saw a submarine coming towards us.
